description:
Memories I can`t recall... My father`s death... and connected to everything, Black Swan. As I chase after the ever deepening mystery, I learn of a disappearance connected to my old high school. At the same time, after deciding to make the theme of our next show "letters" to tie in to a current hit movie, I head out to look into a ramen shop near my old high school. Along with research for the show, I feel I need to investigate the disappearance and head toward the high school, but...
Source: crunchyroll
